title: Needed!! Sweet Cap 350-460 Factory 42 Jennings, Crawford or Griffith

posts.post_title: Needed!! Sweet Cap 350-460 Factory 42 Jennings, Crawford or Griffith
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I need one more card for the HOF backs line.  Does anyone have a SC 350-460 Factory 42 with McGraw Port, Jennings, Crawford, or Griffith.  I prefer graded VG or VGEX, either SGC or PSA is fine.
Thanks for the help again,
Bob
